text: Osʹ, budʹ laska lyublyatʹ yikh, v toy chas, yak vony ne lyublyatʹ vas, ta vy viryte v vsʹomu svyatomu pysannyu. Koly vony zustrichayutʹ vas yak kazhutʹ, "My vvazhayemo," ale yak tilʹky vony lyshayutʹ, vony kusayutʹ yikhni palʹtsi z rage do vas. Skazhitʹ, "Vmyrayutʹ u vashomu rage." BOH znaye tsilkom nayhlybshi dumky
